items.sentence: Tom wasn't at all surprised by what happened.
Tom wasn't able to do what needed to be done.
Tom was surrounded by a group of his friends.
Tom was sitting on the bench at the bus stop.
Tom was cussing at Mary when she slapped him.
Tom was by far the best swimmer in his class.
Tom was a freshman when Mary was a sophomore.
Tom told me to do the same thing again today.
Tom told his children to put away their toys.
Tom threw a wet sponge at me in school today.
Tom should've done what Mary asked him to do.
Tom should definitely have kept his promises.
Tom should be about halfway to Boston by now.
Tom sat by himself in the dark movie theater.
Tom promised to give us everything we needed.
Tom often swims in the pond behind his house.
Tom now owns the house that Mary used to own.
Tom is swimming in the pond behind his house.
Tom wondered why Mary wasn't eating anything.
Tom won't tell Mary why he's going to Boston.
